__e: Sometimes, love is hard, but you can't just run away from it.
It's nothing. I mean, i can't and i won't, And that's why i'm looking for excuses to avoid him,
He never told us to avoid him, and neither did you, for that matter.
I can't do anything to quiet it, but I am inquiring about your perspective.
I know what it's like to be in her place.
We try to avoid it, but sometimes... what's best for the case... what's best for the world, turns out to be a very different thing than what's best for the person.
I CAN OUTMANEUVER HIM FOR A WHILE BUT NOT FOREVER.
All day long, I've avoided this room and I'm sorry.
For two years, I tried to not do it, and it turns out she was right.
